caption.p: POCUS Examination Findings From COVID-19 Patients

tr.th: Summary of POCUS Examination Findings on COVID-19 Patients

tr.td:
Posterior and inferior lung field lesions
7

Confluent and isolated B lines (Figure B and C; Supplemental Digital Content 2, Video 2, http://links.lww.com/AA/D95; Supplemental Digital Content 3, Video 3, http://links.lww.com/AA/D96; and Supplemental Digital Content 4, Video 4, http://links.lww.com/AA/D97)
1, 6– 9

Thickened and/or irregular pleural lines (Figure B, C, and E; Supplemental Digital Content 2, Video 2, http://links.lww.com/AA/D95; Supplemental Digital Content 3, Video 3, http://links.lww.com/AA/D96; and Supplemental Digital Content 4, Video 4, http://links.lww.com/AA/D97)
1, 6– 9

Presence of subpleural consolidations (Figure D and F; Supplemental Digital Content 3, Video 3, http://links.lww.com/AA/D96 and Supplemental Digital Content 5, Video 5, http://links.lww.com/AA/D98)
1, 6– 9

Air bronchograms (Figure F; Supplemental Digital Content 5, Video 5, http://links.lww.com/AA/D98)
1, 7

fn.p: Abbreviations: COVID-19, coronavirus disease 2019; POCUS, point-of-care ultrasound.
